top_stories.title: OpenAI deepens India push with Pine Labs fintech partnership
top_stories.description: OpenAI moves beyond ChatGPT in India with a Pine Labs deal targeting enterprise payments and AI-driven commerce.
top_stories.author: Jagmeet Singh
top_stories.content: OpenAI moves beyond ChatGPT in India with a Pine Labs deal targeting enterprise payments and AI-driven commerce.

top_stories.title: Google Introduces Jetpack Compose Glimmer: A New Spatial UI Framework Designed Specifically for the Next Generation of AI Glasses
top_stories.description: Google is moving beyond the rectangular screen. For over 10 years, Google designers have explored how to build interfaces for transparent displays. The result is Jetpack Compose Glimmer, a design system built specifically for display AI glasses. For devs and data scientists, this is a shift from designing for pixels to designing with light. The […] The post Google Introduces Jetpack Compose Glimmer: A New Spatial UI Framework Designed Specifically for the Next Generation of AI Glasses appeared...
top_stories.author: Michal Sutter
top_stories.content: Google is moving beyond the rectangular screen. For over 10 years, Google designers have explored how to build interfaces for transparent displays. The result is Jetpack Compose Glimmer, a design system built specifically for display AI glasses. For devs and data scientists, this is a shift from designing for pixels to designing with light. top_stories.title: AI meets HR: Transforming talent acquisition with Amazon Bedrock
top_stories.description: In this post, we show how to create an AI-powered recruitment system using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases, AWS Lambda, and other AWS services to enhance job description creation, candidate communication, and interview preparation while maintaining human oversight.
top_stories.author: Dola Adesanya
top_stories.content: In this post, we show how to create an AI-powered recruitment system using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases, AWS Lambda, and other AWS services to enhance job description creation, candidate communication, and interview preparation while maintaining human oversight.

top_stories.title: Manage Amazon SageMaker HyperPod clusters using the HyperPod CLI and SDK
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to use the CLI and the SDK to create and manage SageMaker HyperPod clusters in your AWS account. We walk through a practical example and dive deeper into the user workflow and parameter choices.
top_stories.author: Nicolas Jourdan
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to use the CLI and the SDK to create and manage SageMaker HyperPod clusters in your AWS account. We walk through a practical example and dive deeper into the user workflow and parameter choices.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B MoE model is now available in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
top_stories.description: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
top_stories.author: Dan Ferguson
top_stories.content: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
